channel.title: [Delta] how to add updates bot with crown next to it? [Delta]
channel.description:
hey guys, i was wondering how to add the updates bot message to my server in my chatbox when people log in. here is an example of what i mean:
[IMG]http://i1031.photobucket.com/albums/y380/mrpopyman/updatebot.jpg[/img]
how do i do so? surely it's just a code i gotta add to client.java or something right?
please note yes i do want the little crown next to it!
my base is delta

item.title: [Delta] how to add updates bot with crown next to it? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @rash Rash
item.description:
@rash wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:3, topic:372324”]The crown is a sprite, handled by the client

Similar to @blu@ Text and Chat effects (blue:chat message), It has command code in client.java client-sided

Very easy to do but takes a bit of knowledge[/quote]

I know this isnt my thread, but the sprite would be infront of your Welcome text, therefor making it both client and server sided?

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] how to add updates bot with crown next to it? [Delta]

item.title: [Delta] how to add updates bot with crown next to it? [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @mrpopyman mrpopyman
item.description:
@mrpopyman wrote:

[quote=“RuneSpace, post:2, topic:372324”][quote author=mrpopyman link=topic=468377.msg3427466#msg3427466 date=1292056641]
no, trust me, it’s just a code to add into client.java, but i dunno what it is
[/quote]

ITS CLIENT SIDED, I JUST ENABLED IT ON MY DELTA CLIENT

Since you wouldnt listen to my first post, do it yourself[/quote]

okok soz

Read full topic
